roleset.name: throwing in jail
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, incarcerate.01. Corresponds to VNcls confine-92.

example.name: args 1, 3
example.text: Mr. Cook Continues His Incarceration For Civil Contempt.

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: Chi Ali sits down with VLADTV in his first post-release interview to talk in-depth about the incident which lead to his incarceration for 14 years.
